sentences.sContent: As a former unionist, he'll be more sensitive to the demands of the people.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a former unionist, he'll be more sensitive to the demands of the people.
sentences.sCn: 作为曾经的工会主义者，他会对民众的要求更加敏感。

remMethod.val: 来自union(n. 联盟， 协会)

工会主义；联合主义；联邦主义
使…成立联盟；使…加入工会（unionize的过去分词）
使……加入工会；使……成立工会

trans.tranCn: 工会会员； 联合主义者
